title: Chadwick Boseman Interview  to  Valentine's Day Pettiness
itunes:title: Chadwick Boseman Interview  to  Valentine's Day Pettiness
description:
Wednesday 2/14 Today on the show we had the star of the highly anticipated Marvel Movie Black "Panther" Chadwick Boseman stop by, who spoke on playing the role as Black Panther, the meaning behind the movie and more. Also, it is Valentines Day but you know Charlamagne had to sprinkle some Valentine pettiness when he made "Donkey of the Day" to all the single ladies that don't have a valentine for today. Moreover, Angela also helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" especially for this day. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Wednesday 2/14 Today on the show we had the star of the highly anticipated Marvel Movie Black "Panther" Chadwick Boseman stop by, who spoke on playing the role as Black Panther, the meaning behind the movie and more. Also, it is Valentines Day but you know Charlamagne had to sprinkle some Valentine pettiness when he made "Donkey of the Day" to all the single ladies that don't have a valentine for today. Moreover, Angela also helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" especially for this day.
